name: @incodelang/accounts
description: Simple Account Management for an express.js Application

scripts.pkg: yarn clean && yarn build && yarn bundle && yarn minify && node scripts/link.js && yarn declare
scripts.clean: yarn del-cli --force dist && del-cli --force docs && del-cli --force bundles && del-cli --force umd && del-cli --force esm
scripts.bundle:esm.client: yarn rollup dist/client/index.js --file bundles/incode.accounts.client-esm.mjs --format esm -c rollup.config.js
scripts.bundle:esm.server: yarn rollup dist/server/index.js --file bundles/incode.accounts.server-esm.mjs --format esm -c rollup.config.js
scripts.bundle:umd.client: yarn rollup dist/client/index.js --file bundles/incode.accounts.client-umd.umd.js --format umd --name InCode -c rollup.config.js
scripts.bundle:umd.server: yarn rollup dist/server/index.js --file bundles/incode.accounts.server-umd.umd.js --format umd --name InCode -c rollup.config.js
scripts.declare:umd: tsc --declaration --declarationDir umd --allowJS --outDir temp umd/client.js umd/server.js && del-cli --force temp
scripts.declare:esm: tsc --declaration --declarationDir esm --allowJS --outDir temp esm/client.js esm/server.js && del-cli --force temp

author: Ben Siebert
